NeedDef.label: power
NeedDef.description: After being hacked the connection to the mechanoid hive is lost, as well as the infinite power the hive provides. As a result, hacked mechanoids depend on their internal backup battery, which can be recharged on mechanoid platforms

NeedDef.label: maintenance
NeedDef.description: Hacking is a delicate business. The hacked parts need to be checked and replaced regularly. A poorly maintained mech not only functions suboptimal, it can also be a danger to the colony. Damaged mechs deteriorate more quickly.
